The second group was in a similar harness and got the same shocks, but hereâ€™s the catch: their lever didnâ€™t work, so they were stuck feeling powerless. The third group? Afterward, all the dogs were put into a big box with a low divider in the middle. One side delivered shocks; the other didnâ€™t. Hereâ€™s where it got interesting. This shows how our past experiences can shape our ability to recognize our choices. If we feel powerless for too long, we might stop trying to change our situation. ğŸš«
